projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Sticker Farm - e-commerce
projects.bodyText:
-A ecomerce app that allow users to upload stickers and labels idea to be created and delivered.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **render** using.

projects.title: Triavial Game
projects.bodyText: - The Trivia Wheel is designed to spin and randomly select a category, generating a question along with multiple answer options from that particular category.
